xfy.fakeview.library.layermerge

类 LayersMergeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • xfy.fakeview.library.layermerge.LayersMergeManager

  • public class LayersMergeManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by XiongFangyu on 2017/11/10. Merge Layers Tools To merge layers, add code: //check if view tree need merge layers if (!LayersMergeManager.needMerge(parent)) return; //all views must be layout before LayersMergeManager manager = LayersMergeManager(parent); manager.mergeChildrenLayers(); //done

    • 构造器详细资料

      • LayersMergeManager

        public LayersMergeManager(android.widget.FrameLayout parent)
        Constructor for this manager
        参数:
        parent - view tree parent. If parent is other ViewGroup(eg. LinearLayout), create a new FrameLayout wrapping that parent, and pass the FrameLayout.

      • LayersMergeManager

        public LayersMergeManager(android.widget.FrameLayout parent,
                          int flag)
        Constructor for this manager
        参数:
        parent - view tree parent. If parent is other ViewGroup(eg. LinearLayout), create a new FrameLayout wrapping that parent, and pass the FrameLayout.
        flag - flag for extracting info

      • LayersMergeManager

        public LayersMergeManager(android.widget.FrameLayout parent,
                          int flag,
                          OnExtractViewGroupListener listener)
        Constructor for this manager
        参数:
        parent - view tree parent. If parent is other ViewGroup(eg. LinearLayout), create a new FrameLayout wrapping that parent, and pass the FrameLayout.
        flag - flag for extracting info
        listener - callback invoked when extracting a ViewGroup

    • 方法详细资料

      • needMerge

        public static boolean needMerge(android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Indicate the view tree need merge
        参数:
        parent - view tree parent
        返回:
        true: need merge, false otherwise

      • isReadyToMerge

        public static boolean isReadyToMerge(android.view.ViewGroup src)
        Indicating the view is layout.
        参数:
        src - view tree parent
        返回:
        true: ready, false otherwise

      • mergeChildrenLayers

        public void mergeChildrenLayers()
        Start merge layers When done, this object is useless.
